TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit HttpCompileException extends System.Web.HttpException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a compiler error occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: The exception message to specify when the error occurs.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults results, string sourceCode) cil managed

Docs.param: A containing compiler output and error information.
The path to the file that contains the source code being compiled when the error occurs.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For the `sourceCode` parameter, you can pass any string information that is descriptive to the error condition; there are no checks on file or path. The <xref:System.Web.HttpCompileException.SourceCode%2A> property returns the string that was passed as the parameter value. If you use a constructor that does not require the `sourceCode` parameter, the <xref:System.Web.HttpCompileException.SourceCode%2A> property is `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If innerException is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Docs.summary: Sets the object with information about the exception.
Gets a message that describes the reason for the current exception.
Docs.value: A string that describes the first compilation error listed in the compiler results. If no compiler results were provided, the property returns the error message provided for this exception, or an empty string (""), if no error message was provided.

Docs.summary: Gets compiler output and error information for the exception.
Docs.value: A containing compiler output and error information.

Docs.summary: Gets a string containing the path to the file that contains the source code being compiled when the error occurs.
Docs.value: The path of the source file being compiled when the error occurs. The default is .
